item.title: Setting Up Bee-Box VM
item.description: I ran into a couple hiccups trying to talk to the bee-box VM and figured I’d blog about how I worked through it/found a solution in case others have similar problems. First off, bee-box is a custom Linux VM pre-installed with bWAPP. The (bWAPP)[http://www.itsecgames.com/] is an extremely buggy web application, with many different security problems that are discoverable/exploitable for practice. In general, since you are intending to “attack” the bWAPP, it’s ideal that it’s on a machine other than your host machine.
